plot: Nozomu is called upon to investigate a serial murder case. Meanwhile, he tries out the Japanese wish-making custom of Tanabata.
title: "Zoku sayonara zetsubô sensei" Kuroi Juni-nin no Zetsubo shojo/Kongetsu Kon'ya Kono Tsuki ga Boku no Namida de Kumorimasu Yoni
plot_es: Nozomu is called upon to investigate a serial murder case. Meanwhile, he tries out the Japanese wish-making custom of Tanabata.
original_name: "Zoku sayonara zetsubô sensei" Kuroi Juni-nin no Zetsubo shojo/Kongetsu Kon'ya Kono Tsuki ga Boku no Namida de Kumorimasu Yoni
